data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Sulu.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sulu, Philippines
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Sulu, Philippines.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.section_summary: On average, 15 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Sulu, Philippines.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Sulu, Philippines.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Sulu who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Sama, Southern people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, guide the church in Sulu, Philippines to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 41,803 believers in the state of Sulu to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Sulu will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.
